Module prelude

  • Re-exports

std::io

Module std::io::prelude1.0.0[−][src]

The I/O Prelude.

The purpose of this module is to alleviate imports of many common I/O traits by adding a glob import to the top of I/O heavy modules:

use std::io::prelude::*;
Run

Re-exports

pub use super::BufRead;
pub use super::Read;
pub use super::Seek;
pub use super::Write;
